reviews.review: This game is entertainingly addictive but it's also filled with toxic survivors and killers. It's like junk food that you know is bad for your body, mind and soul but you still keep going back to it.

遊戲玩法很有趣, 但是BUG太多了。和朋友組隊就會發生不明錯誤一直彈出。垃圾管理
They did a pretty good job? bul**hit!
多玩了一段時間後, 發現地圖各種卡位.

外掛問題嚴重.

第六年大改版後可以刪遊戲了.
平衡做得太差

killer kills survivor, survivor loops killer while other survivors finish gens, both complains to each other and they all leave forgeting that match happened in another hour or so, then they queue up for another go.

1 hour in dbd would be like:
10 minutes you are camped by bubba
10 minutes you are getting tunneled
10 minutes you choose your best out of best charms noone will ever see
20 minutes you are waiting killer queue
5 minutes you play as killer, cause these claudettes DCed again
5 minutes you cry

10/10 game
cute oomfies in my basement 1 uwu 2 owo x3 entity is pweased with oomfie 4 >=)

Es un excelente juego si juegas con amigos y sobretodo como sobreviviente, si juegas solo como sobreviviente te esperaran colas muy largas, y si decides jugar como asesino, prepárate para frustrarte por que la desventaja ya que para el rol de asesino es ta muy mal balanceado el juego.

This game is fun at first until you get to about mid to high level play and everyone is pretty much required to run certain perks. After you grind to get certain said perks you will notice pretty much every killer plays something like spirit and its super unfun and most killers will just tunnel you out of the game anyway even if you have decisive strike. This game becomes less fun the longer and more experienced you get not for the normal reasons of you get bored but because the devs refuse to nerf or change things that are toxic for this game. I want to love this game and I do love this game but when you get to high level consistent cross map slugging, tunneling, unfair addons or perks on both sides makes this game to much of a frustration to play and have fun with it.

鍵持ちor煽りVCPTとキャントンキラーへのストレス耐性がある人のみ楽しめるゲーム。沸点が低い人にはお勧めできない。民度がかなり低い。ドMの方向けゲーム。
スキルレーティングではないため、ゲームバランスが悪いことが多い。サバイバーのランクは信用できない。ランク帯が全く違うPTだとキラー側が不利になる。キラーの現状は戦術的キャントンをしなければ４サクは厳しいだろう。
还不错，想找几个人一块玩。(有姐姐就更好了)
para jugar con los panas y solo, bugs pero se soporta

游戏是好游戏，只是容易遇到素质低的杀手，我玩杀手的时候从不直接杀死人的！本来杀手权力就大过天，你TM这种下流玩儿法真TM缺德！！！！五行啥都不缺，就缺德！
在这里我只想对这些直接杀人的杀手（比如有场游戏里遇到的名字叫“KUZANVXZ”的垃圾）说：CNDY！CNM！ 死全家去吧！

I love the game and enjoy it so much! 
BUT some assholes (for example: a gamer named "KUZANVXZ") prefer to kill the survivor directly, just like cheating, I feel SO SO SO shamed for you! Bad ass! Fuck ur ass! U son of bitch! Go to hell!

if you play this game for 3 hour straight
you have a sudden urge to jump off in front of the train

10/10 would kill myself
The feeling when the killer is chasing you is so incredible it felt like i was high
สนุก มันส์ เพลิน ยิ่งเล่นกับเพื่อน ยิ่งสนุก แต่ Killer มีดยาวเกินไปครับ

Ancak indirimde almanızı gerektiren bir oyun,sizi bağımlısı yapacak kadar harika,ana,avrat,mezar,kitap,bebek,beşik,ölü,diri,gibi manevi şeylere de sövdürecek kadar da bela bir oyun


Şöyle Söyleyeyim : oyunda yeni bir etkinlik yada DLC tarzı güncelleme gerektiren eklentiler geldiğinde oyundan alacağınız haz: 0'a düşecektir, Çünkü : inanılmaz derecede BUG, inanılmaz derecede server adaletsizliği var, bu durumu defalarca kez yaşadım, mesela : beni ping seviyelerimin düşük olabileceği eşleştirmelere atmak varken, uganda yada afrika madenlerinden bağlanan usta başılarının oyununa atıyor, bu durumda da ping 500 bilemedin 300 leri görebiliyor, ayrıca duvar arkası yediğiniz damage'ler olsun, pencereden atlayıp anasının nikahına kaçtıktan sonra katilin size vurması cabası

Unutmadan : Oyun bilimum O-Ç stoğunu iyi yapmış bir oyun katil sizi direk yere düşürüp kancaya astıktan sonra ölene kadar bekleyebilir, bu gibi durumlarda da takım arkadaşlarınızın kaçmasına yönelik, kolay kolay ölmeyin, aklınıza gelen tüm ama tüm küfürleri ederek, mezardakinden,beşiktekine kadar.Bekleyin ki ! insanlar jeneratörleri yapsın sonrada kaçsın

Takım Arkadaşları: Bazen KAHPENİN EVLATLARI denk gelebilyor, böyle saçma, salak, aptal aptal hareketlerde bulunup oyununuzu zehir edebiliyor, mesela: siz onu iyileştirirsiniz, o sizi iyileştirmez S.Olup gider yada oyunu çevirebilecek bir hareket yapması gerekirken, bilerek MAL oğlu MALLIK yapar ve katilin önüne atlar oyun gider, jeneratörleri patlatır yada sizi bloklar, katil gelir size vurur sayılabilecek bir sürü şey var...En başta da dediğin gibi bağımlısı yapacak kadar harika küfür etmekten cehennemlik edecek kadarda toxic canlılarla dolu bir oyun saygılarımla...

My buddy Brad D. thinks that this shit is actually a good game, imagine me breaking down the entire game in just a couple of sentences. First off you run. Thats it you just run in ciricles like a fucking moron from the spoopy guy. Then whilst running around like a fucking monkey fuck you jump through a window or knock down a piece of wood. HOW THRILLING IS THE GAME PLAY. The whole goal of the game is too start some stupid ass generator so you can leave? Here's an idea just leave. This game is trash it will never be good no matter how many horror movie icons they add. Congrats Brad you fucking loser.

2022.7.20：神他妈怪奇物语二次联动，zzz整我是怨种是吧，rnm,退钱！

Well so far i have only played as killer and so far in the 5 hours i quite enjoyed it the game has you to rely on sound and vision but i don't know about survivors because i have not played survivors yet but i do recommend this game is fun and i like it .
野排的队友不是挂机就是秒倒拔线，不是四排根本没有游戏体验。希望能尽快推出新机制制裁消极比赛的阴间野人

Ich spielte viele Stunden DbD. Aber jetzt wo ich noch einigen Monaten zurück komme finde ich die Spielmeachanik extrem mist! Was soll das neue, das viel schlechter als vorher. Wenn man einen Generator aktiviert vor vorher ein eigenes "Spiel primzip"... nun wird es einfach ins geschehen eingefükt und das totaller mist! Ich konnte in 10 Matches nur 1. Generator mit dem "neuen system" aktivieren. Das geht gar nicht! 

Von mir gibt es jetzt aktuell einen Daumen runter! Wie kann man ein so geiles spiel zu schlecht updaten !`?

Dead By Daylight is a great game, the feeling of escaping a trial or getting a 4k is amazing. Sometimes the community is toxic, like every other competitive game. With so many killers and survivors to choose from, with their own unique "teachable" perks. It can become very fun when you start experimenting with different perk builds. Also if you wanna spend a little money on the game they have cosmetics for almost every killer and survivor to choose from. So overall Dead By Daylight is a great game, 9/10.
si quieres un juego para pasarla bien y desestresarte  no te recomiendo este juego ..... ahora si quieres sacar logros y te gusta la toxicidad que esperas para jugar dead by daylight ...
It's fun and all but where is friday the 13th characters and needs some work on the maps but overall fun.
簡単に言うと　かくれんぼⅹ鬼ごっこ　難しいけど面白い

Das spiel ist echt gut kann man empfehlen, was ich nicht so toll finde das viele Killer sehr schnell alle platt machen und töten so das man viel weniger punkte macht als möglich wären. Man kann ein spiel auch in die länge ziehen  dann bringt das allen mehr.
Reminds me of my childhood, but my uncles in jail now
I despise myself and my friends are leaving me. My wife took the kids and all of my money in the divorce. This game has ruined everything.
nunca pensé que la forma más eficaz de escapar de demonios en el limbo es zigzageando 10/10
Nobody reads the reviews for sure, so I'll say I'm gay
This game is extremely fun to play with friends and with strangers, it's nice and hardly glitches for me. 10/10
scarey gave me ptsd when my drunk dad tried to beat me to death

Se vc gosta de passar raiva, vá em frente! Os killers são todos maratonistas com superpoderes e os sobreviventes são reles mortais, que depois de entrarem num clube de futebol, após muito tempo de prática, aprendem o dom do drible. Mas até lá é muita porrada na costa, muita começão de poeira, cair de cara nas camas de casal estrategicamente colocadas no cenário, tentar fugir pelas janetas que nem trombadinha e tomar na lomba e por aí vai. Boa sorte! Pra jogar com os amigos é divertido e dá pra passar várias horas nesse simulador de esconde esconde.

Theres so much reasons to hate this game but the biggest are tunneling killers. My last 3 games looked like this: -We spawn, i spawn in the killers face (almost) -He ofc runs after me and even tho im a red rank and yes i CAN loop killers at some point you might get downed and the next step? yes camping :D so much fun and it got SO SO much worse lately! There isnt enough for the killer to loose when he camps because your idiot random team mates will do NOTHING no Gens and especially not helping you. You have to play with borrowed time and Dstrike every game because even if you get off the hook the killer just chases you in the instant youre free. And its not like this shit stops at any point! since BHVRs "genius" idea of SBMRR happened so many many low Rank killers get "good" results in the MMRs view (wich is kills) and they get ranked with Survivors way higher theyr grade. Is it fun outplaying a Ash killer? yes, but the problem starts where theres a Killer that might not be too bad in chases but still isnt confident enough to not camp or does it on purpose because they have a bad personality in general and the same for your mates they just pull the killer in you on EVERY damn occasion! i got sold more times i can even count by now and cheaper than items on wish! Last time the killer lost me in chase and i healed myself peacefully in a boon totem some idiot pulled him in me on absolute purpose (he even run circles around me so that the killer can find me 100%) and i got camped afterwards, ofc the one that got him in me didnt help he ran away and healed himself instead! letting me get phase 2 then some dude can and got me off with no BT yeah okay at least he tried but what happened after? yep tunneling  AGAIN. And so i chased and chased used DSTRIKE and got chased again until i died. And this is what this game looks like 24/7 atm i just cant play this shit anymore it was so much fun back then when Grades where still Ranks! a Red Rank killer rarely tunnels because he doesent need to! A red Rank survivor Play actually usefull because they can loose Pips and not just troll every time thyre on a "save" grade where they cant loose pips anyways so they just DC or Troll or dont give 1 damn.
BHVR DO SOMETHING!
Amazing, but not perfect game, with a pretty toxic, but sometimes wholesome community
as vezes eu fico pensando porque gasto tanto tempo nesse jogo, ele desbloqueou um lado meu que nem eu conhecia, sinto que to num relacionamento toxico
玩护士血压已经上来了

Assim, mano, como uma pessoa com praticamente 600 horas de jogo, que pegou rank 1 tanto de killer quanto de survivor, que vive loopando e sendo loopado, caindo e derrubando, curando e sendo curado, desenganchando e sendo desenganchado, com tantos Dead Hard furados, sendo tunelado, tomando face camp, dando palletada, dando flashlight save, pallet save, destruindo gancho sem parar, tendo a hatch fechada na minha cara, posso afirmar que, mesmo tendo tanto bug no jogo, tendo gente tóxica e mesmo perdendo no game, você se diverte quando você aprende mais do game. E digo mais! Mesmo sendo iniciante, o jogo é divertido de qualquer forma porque o matchmaking até rola na maioria das vezes (mas não todas ;~;). Enfim, valeu a pena cada segundo, hoje em dia, tenho probleminhas por ser main DEATHSLINGER e faço build de Fast Vault sem dó maioria das partidas. De qualquer forma, valeu a pena ter o game, me divirto com meus amigos e cada segundo valeu a pena demais, recomendo comprar, se jogar com amigo, melhor ainda, tmj.
Extremely fun to play with friends and chase each other around in custom games! 4/4 Hooked Survivors recommend!
Не играйте пацаны вы матерям ещё нужны
could i get a refund i just bought the game a day before it went free, love the game already!!
